page.title: 07THE UNEMPLOYED
page.content: and 25% from the District Council.The aim of the centre is to help combat the effects of unemployment by organising educational and rec- reational activities eg.computer courses and canoeing.Advice is also given on such topics as welfare rights adult education and self-employment. In a questionaire the average age of interviewees was 20.Many were involved in training courses, some are trainee instructors in outdoor activities.Some devote much time and effort to youth organisations.All this combines to give hope of a permanent job in the future.Other unemployed spend their time in the centre using the available facilities.Only some are satisfied with the YTS and all feel benefits are too low.The unemployed feel the employed are unconcerned about them.
